{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$913.6K in 2021-2022** on contracts with AXYS TECHNOLOGIES.

Across 64 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 10 have at least one amendment (16%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 238% and the average number of amendments was 2. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$2.5M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.59 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$101.1K. The longest contract was 10 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$2.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
